data.title: A Marriage of True Minds: An Intimate Portrait of Leonard and Virginia Woolf
data.meta_description: Hardcover. First American edition, second printing. Small quarto. xiii, 210pp. Illustrated from black and white photographs. Binding slightly cocked, else near fine in a lightly worn, about near fine dust jacket with a slightly sunned spine. Item #515694 ISBN: 0151574499
data.text:
